name: Escape from M.O.N.J.A.S.
description: Pink has dreams. He wants to rescue spaceships in danger, fight against hostile life forms, and visit new planets. Unfortunately, he is trapped in an old space station in Mars, with a boring life and surrounded by all kind of odd coworkers. But sudendly, one day, a mysterious captain arrives. Maybe this is the opportunity that pink has been waiting for...
